title: Hurry!!! 3 Bedroom House Available For Rent
posting_body: Picture-perfect main lakefront living is available now at this beautiful property, nestled on ALL-SPORTS CEDAR ISLAND LAKE!
This home has everything you need to enjoy life on the water including 83 feet of pristine sandy beach frontage.
Open floorplan concept throughout the entire home with spectacular water views from almost every room.
Entry level is comprised of the family room, kitchen (tons of storage/prep space), breakfast nook, two bedrooms and two full baths.
Serious applicants should reply with their direct email address and phone number for easy communication.
